Maria Lopez.description: conversing about the event structure and Maria offering to help Klaus with it, to which Klaus assures her they have everything covered but will reach out if needed @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus, I noticed you were discussing the event structure over the phone, do you need any help with that?
Hey Maria, thanks for offering to help. I think we've got everything covered for now, but I'll let you know if we need any assistance.
Okay, sounds good. Just wanted to make sure you had everything under control. Let me know if anything comes up.
